name: Tareo UK
slogan: TiiPii Bed - The Ultimate Portable Hanging Daybed
description:
As an independent designer and retailer, we are delighted to introduce you to our range of luxury hanging daybeds, designed with your comfort & relaxation at front of mind. We offer a range of sizes & styles of beds, along with a range of accessories to complement & enhance the core products.

Born out of a desire to inspire luxurious enjoyment & relaxation of your outdoor spaces, whether that be reclining and reading a book, cosying up with a glass of wine, a friend or partner, or opening up a world of adventure for the kids to camp and play, we have a TiiPii to suit.

team.name: Michael Merritt
team.bioHtml: CEO @ TiiPii. Worked at Skycarte, Drake Int, Aus Unity... Experience with Operations and Business Development. Went to Victoria University

jobs.title: Sales / Business Development Manager
jobs.description:
This is a fantastic opportunity to lead and gain experience in a fast-growing creative start-up, during a period of massive growth venturing into new markets and territories around the world.  Working closely with the founders to implement our sales strategy relating to business goals spanning Europe, USA, Australia and other territories around the world. 

You will play a key role in growing our company into new territories and markets where our brands are sort after and desired lifestyle brands:

●	Travel to industry events, trade shows, and cities across the country and internationaly to build relationships with prospective clients
●	Initiate and develop relationships with potential clients and educate them about how our range of products would be a good fit for them.
●	Work existing demand that’s been qualified by our team.
●	Unearth new opportunites and partnerships
●	Orchestrate in-person visits to understand prospective clients’ current product range and what they are looking for
●	Run product demos and trainig to close business 
●	Reach out to prospects via email, phone, and LinkedIn to educate them on our product ranges
●	Qualify those prospects to determine whether or not they’re a good fit to partner with our brands.
●	Build a pipeline of prospects from different industries and manage this daily through our CRM

About You:
●	You have a track record of 2 - 5 years of high achievement in a sales position from a creative industry.
●	You love to build relationships and don’t mind working accounts for months -- you’re tenacious
●	You have experience and existing connections in the US market
●	You have a network of designers and trade clients 
●	You have a growth mindset and view setbacks as learning opportunities, not failures
●	You don’t mind traveling regularly for work
●	You have a tireless positive attitude
●	You have experience using CRM software to track, manage and close leads
●	You love getting to know new people and helping them solve their product purchasing challenges with a unique niche range that will give them a point of difference.

Application Closing Date is 29th January 2020
